segments.text: I ’ m sorry sir . This computer is not broken or damaged . It ’ s simply just too old ! That ’ s why your programs and applications are running slow . There really isn ’ t much I can do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean ? I bought this computer just three years ago !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but technology is ever changing and technology is becoming obsolete faster and faster !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I know where this is going . How much will it cost me to get a new computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , this desktop over here is our latest model . It has a four gigahertz processor with sixteen gigabytes in RAM and a hard disk with one terabyte . Of course , it includes a mouse , keyboard and desk speakers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea what you are talking about . I just want to know if it ’ s good and if I will be able to play solitaire without the computer crashing or freezing all the time !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This PC is top of the line and I guarantee it will never freeze ! If it does , we ’ ll give you your money back !
segments.speaker: S2
